job_description: We are looking for a front-end developer with experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to join our team.
job_responsibility: Develop and maintain front-end features for our web applications. Work with designers and back-end developers to ensure a seamless user experience. Participate in code reviews and testing. Debug and troubleshoot issues as needed.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 3+ years of experience in front-end development.

job_description: We are looking for a back-end developer with experience in Java, Python, and databases to join our team.
job_responsibility: Design and develop scalable and reliable back-end systems that support our web applications. Work with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration. Participate in code reviews and testing. Debug and troubleshoot issues as needed.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 5+ years of experience in back-end development.

job_description: We are looking for an iOS developer with experience in Swift to join our team.
job_responsibility: Design and develop iOS applications that meet user needs and requirements. Work with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with back-end systems. Participate in code reviews and testing. Debug and troubleshoot issues as needed.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 3+ years of experience in iOS development.

job_description: We are looking for a cloud engineer with experience in Azure to join our team.
job_responsibility: Design and develop cloud-based solutions using Azure. Collaborate with other teams to ensure seamless integration of cloud-based systems. Participate in code reviews and testing. Debug and troubleshoot issues as needed.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 5+ years of experience in cloud engineering with Azure.

job_description: We are looking for a Java developer to join our team.
job_responsibility: Design and develop scalable and reliable Java applications. Work with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with other systems. Participate in code reviews and testing. Debug and troubleshoot issues as needed.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 3+ years of experience in Java development.

job_description: We are looking for a software development engineer to join our team.
job_responsibility: Design and develop high-quality, scalable software solutions. Work with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with other systems. Participate in code reviews and testing. Debug and troubleshoot issues as needed.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 5+ years of experience in software development.

job_description: We are looking for a full stack developer to join our team.

experiences: 3+ years of experience in full stack development.

job_description: We are looking for a database administrator to join our team.
job_responsibility: Design, install, and maintain Oracle databases. Work with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with other systems. Troubleshoot and resolve database issues. Develop and implement database security policies.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
experiences: 5+ years of experience in database administration with Oracle.
